value.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Use Visual Studio together with a test framework to create, deploy, and test an Azure Function.

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

value.title: Explore the access management capabilities of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Explore the access management capabilities of Azure AD

value.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Automate development tasks by using GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Create a basic GitHub Action and use that action in a workflow.

value.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn along with the Space Game web team the benefits of collaboration through Visual Studio Code and GitHub.

value.title: Implement initial configuration of Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Implement initial configuration of Azure Active Directory

value.title: Implement message-based communication workflows with Azure Service Bus
value.excerpt: Discover how to write code in .NET applications using Azure Service Bus for communications that can handle high demand, low bandwidth, and hardware failures.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Introduction to Azure virtual networks
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to design and implement fundamental Azure Networking resources such as virtual networks, public and private IPs, DNS, virtual network peering, routing, and Azure Virtual NAT.

value.title: Manage device identity with Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage device identity by using Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming.

value.title: Fundamentals of network security
value.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Petabyte-scale ingestion with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline
value.excerpt: Petabyte-scale ingestion with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline

value.title: Populate slowly changing dimensions in Azure Synapse Analytics pipelines
value.excerpt: Populate slowly changing dimensions in Azure Synapse Analytics pipelines

value.title: Get started with Rust
value.excerpt: Learn how to get started with Rust - set up the environment, write a program, and use the Cargo build system.

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
value.excerpt: Azure Files provides a cloud-based file share for storing and sharing files to applications. Whether it's an application hosted in Azure App Service, an Azure VM, or an on-premises app, Azure Files can store and share file access between one or more applications and systems in a secure and failure-resilient manner.

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

value.title: Azure Certifications for developers | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn about the Azure Certifications for developers.    For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01

value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7pmn6luCwQ4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WElUQm02BTU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Introducing the Azure Data Box family | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Mathew Dickson joins Donovan Brown to discuss the Data Box family of solutions to meet the challenge of moving data to the cloud. Azure Data Box offline devices help you transfer large amounts of data to Azure when the network isn't an option. Data Box online products act as network storage gateways

value.title: Issue and accept verifiable credentials using Azure Active Directory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sydney Morton joins Scott Hanselman to show how verifiable credentials enable you to own and prove who you are in the digital world. See how to enable decentralized identity through seamless user and developer experiences.  ⏩ 0:00 – Intro ⏩ 0:37 – Overview ⏩ 3:01 – Demo – end user experience ⏩ 6:14 –

value.title: Quantum programming with Q# and running on hardware with Azure Quantum | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Mariia Mykhailova joins Scott Hanselman to discuss quantum computing and quantum programming with Microsoft Quantum Development Kit (QDK), from writing Q# code to running it on hardware via Azure Quantum.  ⏩ 0:00 – Intro ⏩ 0:51 – Overview ⏩ 5:43 – From algorithm to coding and unit tests ⏩ 20:58 – Jupyter

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Discover Azure's three approaches to deploying cloud resources -- public, private, and hybrid -- and learn the difference each makes in your Azure services.
